original_text: for he has been longing for you all and has been distressed because you heard that he was ill.
korean_text: 그가 너희 무리를 간절히 사모하고 자기가 병든 것을 너희가 들은 줄을 알고 심히 근심한지라

sentences.original_text: for he has been longing for you all
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 여러분 모두를 갈망해 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: because you heard that he was ill.
sentences.korean_translation: 여러분이 그가 아프다는 것을 들었기 때문입니다
